entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
